item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Man is the only creature who refuses to be what he is." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Jim Thompson
item.description: "Life is a bucket of shit with a barbed wire handle." -- Jim Thompson

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Harlan Ellison
item.description: "The two most common elements in the universe are Hydrogen and stupidity." -- Harlan Ellison

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Thomas Ligotti
item.description: "To my mind, a well-developed sense of humor is the surest indication of a person's humanity, no matter how black and bitter that humor may be." -- Thomas Ligotti

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Alan Moore
item.description: "My experience of life is that it is not divided up into genres; itâ€™s a horrifying, romantic, tragic, comical, science-fiction cowboy detective novel. You know, with a bit of pornography if you're lucky." -- Alan Moore

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Bill Watterson
item.description: "Reality continues to ruin my life." -- Bill Watterson

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Isaac Asimov
item.description: "The saddest aspect of life right now is that science gathers knowledge faster than society gathers wisdom." -- Isaac Asimov

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Vladimir Nabokov
item.description: "Let all of life be an unfettered howl. Like the crowd greeting the gladiator. Don't stop to think, don't interrupt the scream, exhale, release life's rapture." -- Vladimir Nabokov

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Texasshole add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company." -- Mark Twain
